description: At the start of battle and at the start of your creatures' turns, they gain a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} that absorbs damage equal to 100% of their Maximum {STAT_health}. After your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} buffs are destroyed, they gain {CONDNAME_BUFF_SHELL}. Your creatures always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND} and {CONDNAME_BUFF_LEECH}.
name: Protective Wing
